blidget.name: Subtitle Task (Stellar)
blidget.documentation:
# Purpose
Raises a subtitling task in Stellar.
# Usage
Requires a project folder containing the assets to be worked on as an input. The project folder should contain a single asset at the top level and any existing subtitle files in a sub folder called "Subtitles".

parameter.name: type
parameter.description: The type of task - for grouping and categorisation purposes

parameter.name: due_date
parameter.description: The date the task is due

parameter.name: tags
parameter.description: A list of user tags to assign the task to

parameter.name: userIds
parameter.description: A list of users to assign the task to

parameter.name: groupIds
parameter.description: A list of groups to assign the task to
